Property.name: FastSomersault
Property.HelpText: When running, turns the Somersault into a slide that retains speed. If you prefer the original animation, select "Enabled (No Slide)".

Property.name: ModernStyleGrinding
Property.HelpText: Prevent falling off and hanging from the sides of rails, which causes speed loss. Named due to the result being similar to grinding in later games.

Property.name: RandomizedHomingSounds
Property.HelpText: Chooses randomly from a selection of 5 sounds for Sonic and Shadow every time they do a Homing Attack.

Property.name: RemoveHomingHeightLimit
Property.HelpText: Allows the Homing Attack to be used at less than 8 units above ground, which isn't allowed usually. Noticeable when jumping onto ledges.

Property.name: NoLowEnemyBounces
Property.HelpText: Sonic and Shadow will always bounce high when hitting an enemy, rather than lower the longer A is held, which causes issues with certain chains.

Property.name: BounceFromLightAttack
Property.HelpText: Bounce up after performing a Light Attack - just like a Homing attack, instead of immediately falling.

Property.name: AutoMagicHandsPrompt
Property.HelpText: Makes the Magic Hands prompt automatically appear when within range of an enemy.

Property.name: RunningMagicHandsDrop
Property.HelpText: Sonic won't hold any enemies he picks up via Magic Hands while running. Disabled by default because of how OP this is with the above.
